information: We are an owner-managed company, all members of which bring their own competence and experience to the table. Our company philosophy stems from three building blocks: WE FOCUS ON QUALITY – Our range covers air-dried wild and medicinal mushrooms of ORGANIC and conventional quality, handmade ORGANIC tagliatelle and a range of risotto mixtures with wild mushrooms, vegetables and herbs. At AnaVita, you get high-quality natural food products with a monitored origin and quality. Our raw materials come predominantly from forests and fields in south-east Europe. WE PROMOTE SUSTAINABILITY – Whether wild or cultivated, raw materials are available only to a limited extent and not uniformly. Therefore, sustainable handling of raw materials is one of the most important factors in the business model of our company. Through training our gatherers and producers, we strive to promote sustainability in a direct way. Our promotion of sustainability has also been realised through a fair and credible relationship with our suppliers. WE WOULD LIKE TO WIN YOUR TRUST – Honest and trusting collaboration with our customers is extremely important to us. The products from the Dr. Ana Collection were developed according to the motto: "I sell only what my family also eats".
